SG_DESCRIPTION: Fuse two "Glows" in order to obtain a "Super Glow"
GLOW_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} At least one of the `Glow` codes you provided is either invalid or not in your inventory
UNAVAILABLE_GLOW: {{author}} At least one of the `Glow` codes you provided is empty
NO_USE_SG: {{author}} At least one of the provided codes is a `Super Glow` already
SAME_GLOWS: {{author}} You cannot use the same `Glow` more than once
CANNOT_FIND_GLOWS:
{{author}} Could not find `Glows` with these codes:
{{codes}}

You are about to use the following items:

{{glowCodes}}

in order to obtain the `Super Glow` **`{{superGlowName}}`**

FORM_SG_FOOTER: All `Glows` used in this process will be destroyed!
